QuestData.Title: Johaan's Experiment
QuestData.Description: Harmless pumpkins, right? Or so it would seem. If we are to defeat the Scourge advances from the North and the human infestation from the South we need to start realizing the full potential of our gift of undeath.$b$bWith a little ingenuity a simple pumpkin becomes an agent for our Dark Lady. This pumpkin, laced with my latest formula, will prove to be quite a treat.$b$bYet another Scarlet Zealot has been captured and is being kept outside, by the gazebo. Take this pumpkin to the fool.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Laced Pumpkin to the Captured Scarlet Zealot at the gazebo at Calston Estate.
QuestData.CompletionText: Stay away, foul and unholy creature! May the Light protect me! The Scarlet Crusade shall rid Azeroth of your...$b$b...oh wait. Is that food for me? I am so hungry...
QuestData.RewardText: By the Light! Finally some food! Sweet, sweet pumpkin....
